# mediaTypes

**Instance Property**

The types of the media items in a collection.

## Declaration

```swift
var mediaTypes: MPMediaType { get }
```

## Discussion

The [doc://com.apple.mediaplayer/documentation/MediaPlayer/MPMediaType] enumeration in [doc://com.apple.mediaplayer/documentation/MediaPlayer/MPMediaItem] lists the media types.

## Using a media item collection

- **items**: The media items in a media item collection.
- **representativeItem**: A media item whose properties are representative of the other media items in a collection.
- **count**: The number of media items in a collection.
